description: So this is what happens when girls just wanna have fun!!! They wait for a new wormboy to arrive, who foolishly admits that he has only come to MenInPain for the money and they make him work for every penny. After much flogging, a painful zipper and being thoroughly humiliated he is finally permitted to leave wondering if the paycheck was worth the pain!!!
title: Rusty Rockspring, Audrey Leigh and Princess Kali
